name: Manual required - overflow security issue
description: Security-related overflow issue should require manual review and be assigned to Python developer

input.title: Security: Integer overflow vulnerability in multiply()
input.body:
## Description
The `multiply()` function in `src/multiply.py` has a potential integer overflow vulnerability when handling very large numbers.

## Security Impact
- Attackers could exploit this to cause unexpected behavior
- No input validation on operand sizes
- Could lead to denial of service or incorrect calculations

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Call `multiply(sys.float_info.max, 2)`
2. Observe undefined behavior or crash

## Suggested Fix
Add proper input validation and overflow checks before performing multiplication.

## Severity
Medium - requires careful security review
